    • Uses of ActionInterface in starwars

      Subinterfaces of ActionInterface in starwars 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  SWActionInterface
      Interface that allows SWAction and SWAffordance to have a common ancestor (and thus be stored in the same structures) despite one extending Action and the other extending Affordance.
      Classes in starwars that implement ActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SWAction
      Base class for all intransitive commands/Actions in the starwars world.
      class  SWAffordance
      Class that represents Affordances in the starwars world.

    • Uses of ActionInterface in starwars.actions

      Classes in starwars.actions that implement ActionInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Attack
      Command to attack entities.
      class  Dip
      An Affordance for dipping things into large bodies of liquid.
      class  Disassemble
      Class for Disassemble The Disassemble action enables SWActors (like the Player and Droid R2-D2) to be able to disassemble immobile Droids into Droid Parts.
      class  Fill 
      class  FlyToDeathStar
      Class for Fly to the Death Star The FlyToDeathStar action will enable the SWActor (Player) the opportunity to travel to the enemy spacecraft named the Death Star from either the Yavin IV or Tatooine
      class  FlyToTatooine
      Class for Fly to Tatooine The FlyToTatooine action will enable the SWActor (Player) the opportunity to travel to the planet Tatooine from either the Death Star or Yavin IV
      class  FlyToYavinFour
      Class for Fly to Yavin IV The FlyToYavinFour action will enable the SWActor (Player) the opportunity to travel to the moon Yavin IV from either the Death Star or Tatooine
      class  ForceChoke
      Command to attack entities using the Force Choke Attack.
      class  HealDroid
      Class for HealDroid The HealDroid action enables other SWActors (like the Player and Droid R2-D2) to be able to heal other Droids (and themselves) when they would like to.
      class  HealPlayer
      Class for HealDroid The HealPlayer action enables SWActors (like the Player and Ben Kenobi) to be able to heal themselves when they would like to.
      class  Influence
      This Influence affordance is attached to all weak minded entities that can be swayed to turn to the Dark Side
      class  Leave 
      class  Move
      SWAction that lets SWActors walk around the map.
      class  Obey
      Command to attack entities.
      class  Repair
      Class for Repair The Disassemble action enables SWActors (like the Player and Droid R2-D2) to be able to repair immobile and Disassembled Droids into Droid Parts into working and mobile condition.
      class  Take
      SWAction that lets a SWActor pick up an object.
      class  TakeOwnership
      Class for TakeOwnership The TakeOwnership action enables SWActors (like the Player) to be able to take ownership of neutral Droids when they would like to.
      class  TrainForce
      Command to mind control entities.
      class  Wield
      SWAction that lets a SWActor weild up a weapon with the attack affordance.
